org.jgroups.annotations.observability

  • Classes in org.jgroups.annotations.observability used by org.jgroups.annotations.observability
    Class
    Description
    ObservableScope
    Defines the scope of an observable metric, distinguishing between runtime operational metrics and configuration/static metrics.
    ObservableType
    Enumeration of OpenTelemetry asynchronous metric types for the @Observable annotation.
    ObservableUnit
    Enumeration of metric units following UCUM (Unified Code for Units of Measure) conventions.
